External Functions

Functions designed for direct end-user interaction

create_OmicsPath create_OmicsSurv create_OmicsReg create_OmicsCateg

Generation Functions for -Omics.* Class Objects

AESPCA_pVals

Test Pathways with AES-PCA

topGenes

Rank the Top Genes from a Ranked Pathways Data Frame

expressedOmes

Extract expressed -omes matching a gene set from a mass spectrometry matrix

Internal AES-PCA Functions

Functions designed to be called by the AES-PCA wrapper above

aespca

Adaptive, Elastic-Net, Sparse PCA

lars.lsa

Least Angle and Lasso Regression models

extract_aesPCs

Extract PCs from pathway-subsets of a mass spectrometry matrix

permTest_OmicsSurv

Permutation Test for Pathway PCs for Survival Response

permTest_OmicsReg

Permutation Test for Pathway PCs for Regression Response

permTest_OmicsCateg

Permutation Test for Pathway PCs for Classification Response

normalize

Normalize a Matrix

Internal Supervised PCA Functions

Functions designed to be called by the Supervised PCA wrapper above

coxTrain_fun

Train Cox Proportional Hazards Model

olsTrain_fun

Gene-Specific Regularized Ordinary Least Squares Estimates

glmTrain_fun

Gene-Specific Generalized Linear Model Estimates

superpc.st

Extract and Test Supervised PCs

mysvd

Singular Value Decomposition Wrapper

weibullMix_pValues

Calculate the p-Values from an Optimal Mixture of Weibull Distributions

weibullMix_optimParams

Calculate the Optimal Parameters for a Mixture of Weibull Distributions

pathway_pValues

Calculate the p-Values from a Mixture if Weibull Extreme Value Distributions

pathway_tControl

Calculate Pathway-Specific Student's t Scores

pathway_tScores

Calculate Pathway-Specific Student's t Scores

sample_Survivalresp sample_Regresp sample_Classifresp

Parametric Bootstrap and Non-parametric Permutations of a Response

superpc.train

Train Supervised PC Model

Internal Supplemental Functions

Utility functions shared by both the AES-PCA and supervised PCA methods

adjust_and_sort

Adjust and Sort Pathway \(p\)-Values

matrixRoot

Positive Root of a Symmetric Matrix

adjustRaw_pVals

Adjust p-Values for Simple Multiple-Testing Procedures
